job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: pHIRING Senior Embedded Software Engineer  Franklin Lakes NJ  DIRECT CLIENT  LongTerm Contract Please reply ASAPppbrppstrongJob Title Senior Embedded Software EngineerstrongppstrongLocation Franklin Lakes NJstrongppstrongDuration LongTerm ContractstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppnbspppThe Senior Embedded Software Engineer is a position contributing to the embedded software development for medical device product advancements The individual would have responsibility for working crossfunctionally to understand enduser needs and system requirements and mapping them to detailed embedded software and electrical design specifications and translating these into robust design elementsppnbspppThe responsibilities can include but are not limited to embedded electronics and software development board design and updates amp design for critical features and functions implementation of features as part of a multidisciplinary RampD team systems electrical mechanical and application software and integrating and verifying implemented features through unit and functional testingppnbspppTypically the Senior Engineer will interface with other development teams for product integration and will interface both internally and externally to understand the clinical use cases usability and system requirementsppnbspppstrongMinimum QualificationsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspBachelors Degree in Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering or software engineeringppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspA minimum of 3 years of posteducational professional experience with focus on Embedded Software Development Board design and developmentppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience developing embedded software in CCAssembly and programming knowledge of RealTime operating systems such as VxWorks Micrium etc is requiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWorking knowledge of digital and analog circuits microprocessor hardware and software and development environmentsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWorking knowledge of advanced mathematical Digital Signal Processing DSP concepts and implementation techniques software instantiation of both linear amp nonlinear algorithmic processes associated with both the analog and digital highly desiredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspRead and understand of schematic designs and Electrical components reference manualsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience generating technical documentation and authoring internalexternal publicationsppnbspppstrongDesired QualificationsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspMasters Degree in Electrical Engineering Computer Engineering or software engineeringppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp5 years of professional experience in the medical device industryppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience programming ARM Cortex M4F or similar processorsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspPrevious experience leading medical device embedded software design effortsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with schematic tools such as OrCAD PSpice or DX DesignerppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with board bringup effective use of hardware test equipment including logic analysers digital storage oscilloscopes etcppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience working with WiFi Blue Tooth and other wireless technologiesppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspProgramming application development and testing instrumentation in python etcppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience developing low level device drivers for hardware peripheral interfaces and devices such as SPI I2C USB LCD ADC DAC RFICppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWorking knowledge of applicable standards for medical devices FDA QSR ISO 13485 ISO 14971 IEC 62304ppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience in a structured development environment with source control and bug tracking systemsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspKnowledgeable in hardwaresoftware interfaces programming of embedded processor utilizing a Real Time Operating System RTOS realtime and post processing data analyticsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with software quality assurance to include unit and integration test development and execution and code inspection and reviewsppnbspppstrongCompetenciesstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent written amp verbal communication skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSelfdirected with the ability to learn and adapt quickly to new technologies and trendsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspTeam player flexible and adaptable and capable of working on an agile environmentppnbspppstrongThanks amp RegardsstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongRavi PalaparthystrongppstrongDirect No 2019051030strongppstrongEmailnbspravipinfojiniconsultingcomstrongp
